title: Intensive Workshop on Research Methodology Using Digital Learning Objects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistics and Research Design Concepts
context.additional_context: Customized research methodology training for professionals, with a focus on strengthening mathematics-based data analysis skills

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more digital learning objects (DLOs) per research design phase applying the ADDIE model.
Learners can visually represent core research methodology concepts (e.g., hypothesis formulation, sampling) using rapid e-learning tools.
Learners can verify the educational effectiveness of DLOs through formative assessments in collaborative peer learning settings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
